entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing Info.plist value. A value for the Info.plist key 'CFBundleIconName' is missing in the bundle #28954
  • Title #28952
  • On iOS GestureRecognizers don't work on Span in a Label, which doesn't get IsVisible (=true) update from its parent #28949
  • [Android] ImageButton - CornerRadius is incorrectly applied on Android with URI source #28948

Closed

  • Sushi1488352 #28950
  • Efe #28951
  • [IOS] CarouselView - Content not sized correctly on 9.0.60 #28947

PullRequests

Created

  • Incorrect label LineBreakMode in IOS inside CarouselView - fix #28955
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [inflight][Windows] Upgrade `Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D` from `1.2.0` to `1.3.2` to fix a build warning #28953
    community ✨

Merged

  • [ci] Produce nightly for inflight/current #28940

Updated

  • [iOS] Trigger OnNavigatedTo method when hide the nav bar and using sw… #28694
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] Inheriting StatusBar and NavigationBar background colors on modal pages #28568
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-modal, .NET 9 SR7
  • Compute LayoutConstraints on new *StackLayout and Grid #28931
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Extensions: Extension static member lookup on generic types does not work #78129
    Next
  • Throw in CPSProjectFactory.GetIntermediateAssemblyPath #65439
    Backlog

Updated

  • Partial default interface members are not virtual #77346
    .NET 10

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused code fix methods #78133
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move ICodeFixService back to Features layer #78132
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add generic log message to avoid lambda allocations. #78128
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Enable Implement with Copilot by default #78131
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace construction to background thread #78051
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'main' into UserDefinedCompoundAssignment #78113
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Project system cleanups #78104
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Delete unused test hook #78105
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge main to runtime async branch #78114
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode

Updated

  • Merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures #77707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Fix issue #70183: adjust the plural for expression collection #78110
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Cache MEF catalog in servicehub process #78122
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: nullability analysis for invocations and method groups #78080
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Expose API to return the Legacy propagator #114584
    10.0.0

Closed

  • TryParseExact not working as expected #114159
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: CreateReadOnlySpanFromNullTerminated for 4-byte characters #114297
  • Mono.Linker.Tests.TestCases.All.DataFlow(t: \"DynamicObjects\") producing IL3050 AOT warning #114596
  • Test failure: Interop/DllImportSearchPaths/DllImportSearchPathsTest/DllImportSearchPathsTest.cmd #114595
  • Test failure: Loader/ExternalAssemblyProbe/ExternalAssemblyProbe/ExternalAssemblyProbe.cmd #114594
  • Repo build crashing with DOTNET_HeapVerify=1 #112613
    10.0.0
  • SerialPort 读取数据被分片的问题 麻烦看清楚在关我的issues #114547
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(targetReg == op1Reg) || (targetReg != op3Reg)' during 'Generate code' #114322
    10.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(targetReg == op1Reg) || (targetReg != op3Reg)' during 'Generate code' #114358
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: profiler/dynamicoptimization/DynamicOptimization/DynamicOptimization.cmd #114314
    10.0.0
  • Widespread perf regressions due to RPO layout #102763
    10.0.0
  • openssl error `digest not allowed` on RSA PSS signature in fips mode #114260
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add long/ulong->float cast helpers #114597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Draft PR to add additional 8 eGPR #114593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reunification of ExInfo #114591
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark InlineArrays as NonVersionable #114590
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • Disable stacks on Debugger IPC events #114585
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Support W3C Propagator #114583
    breaking-change, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Fix "MMM.yy" date parsing in German culture. #114169 #114194
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Don't use incompatible LOAD_LIBRARY_SEARCH flags when using LOAD_WITH_ALTERED_SEARCH_PATH #111990
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • ML-KEM: Fix checking encapsulation key size #114574
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Remove unused CLRConfigs #114587
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Revert "Don't use incompatible LOAD_LIBRARY_SEARCH flags when using LOAD_WITH_ALTERED_SEARCH_PATH" #114592
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Print load immediate value in disassembly #114470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Fix loop recognition bug in .NET 8 #114457
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.16
  • Fix verify_free_list #114540
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Split up loader heap implementations #114246
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Handle DelayFree for HW_Category_SIMDByIndexedElement intrinsics #114525
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prevent DynamicOptimization test from running with DOTNET_ForceRelocs=1 #114578
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • fix: in rsa signatures, configure digest before padding mode #114261
    area-System.Security, community-contribution

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2685915 #114238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #99136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Move lower 12 bits of indirection address to load / store offset #114488
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Make Number.FormatBigInteger JIT-firendly #113165
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Reimplement PR 112032, preserve trailing extra data when updating ZIP files #113306
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Add an IsFuncletCache to the EECodeInfo #114580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add breaking change rule for adding partial modifier to interface methods #114537
    area-Meta
  • [clr-interp] Add support for virtual method calls #114529
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Includes type forwarding for System.Text.Unicode.Utf8 to the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory library #111292
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Make it possible to preinitialize `ComInterfaceEntry` #114459
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable AVX2 optimistically with AVX on NAOT #114575
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • MLDsaOpenSsl + tests #114485
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Micro optimizations to improve the performance of EH stackwalking, particularly in the X86 with Funclets model #114582
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/9.0][wasm][interpreter] Fix PackedSimd interpreter intrinsics #114218
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Send host tests to helix #114187
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113977
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce string interpolation overhead #114497
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Zip async implementation #114421
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] Introduce Zbb #114150
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add support to add new FieldRVAs to EnC #114463
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Draft : Reduce TP regression in allocateRegistersMinimal() #113988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.content:
